element.name: Compact Construction
element.description: Increases the max size of our hull by 15 hexes.

element.name: Explorer Hull
element.description: Allows construction of Explorer class ships, with a base max hull size of 40.

element.name: Module Logistics
element.description: Increase the max size of our hulls by an additional 30 hexes.

element.name: Cruiser Hull
element.description: Allows construction of Cruiser class ships, with a base max hull size of 75.

element.name: Advanced Logistics
element.description: Increase the max size of our hulls by an additional 45 hexes.

element.name: Dreadnought Hull
element.description: Allows construction of Dreadnought class ships, with a base max hull size of 125.

element.name: Large Bulkheads
element.description: Allows the construction of two and three hex bulkheads.

element.name: Improved Deflectors
element.description: Increases the resistance of deflectors and allows construction of larger deflector modules.

element.name: Heavy Deflectors
element.description: Allows construction of stronger deflectors.

element.name: Material Composites
element.description: Additionally increases the resistance of deflector modules.

element.name: Thermal Analysis
element.description: Allows simulation of ships thermal generation for analysis.

element.name: Entropic Shunts
element.description: Increases the rate at which modules dissipate heat to neighbors and/or radiate into space.

element.name: Exhaust Vents
element.description: Allows us to build modules that cycle enthalpic condensate out into space, increasing heat dissipation.

element.name: Module Hardening
element.description: Decreases the performance penalty of damaged modules.

element.name: Chromaplate
element.description: Allows customization of hull plating colors.

element.name: Material Memory
element.description: Our modules will retain a memory of their structure, speeding up repairs by 7%.

element.name: Reactive Nanofibers
element.description: Increase our repair rate by an additional 10%.

element.name: Crew Quarters
element.description: Allows the construction of Crew Quarter modules, increasing maximum number of support crew.

element.name: Engines I
element.description: Engines propel our ship through space.

element.name: Engines II
element.description: More powerful engines with greater thrust per hex.

element.name: Engines III
element.description: Huge engines to propel our biggest ships.

element.name: Ion Drives
element.description: Increases our engine's max thrust.

element.name: Warp Generator
element.description: Allows building of the Warp Drive module, allowing near instantaneous short tactical jumps.

element.name: Warp Extension
element.description: Increase the maximum charge of our warp generator by 30%.

element.name: Hyperplaning
element.description: Extend our maximum warp charge by an additional 40%.

element.name: Warp Coolant
element.description: Increase the field recharge rate of our warp generator by 20%.

element.name: Warp Multiplex
element.description: Increase the charge rate of our warp generator by an additional 30%.

element.name: Turbo Thrust
element.description: Allows our engines to switch to a high energy, low efficiency burn for increased speed.

element.name: Improved Handling
element.description: Increases our ship's turn responsiveness, including both rotational acceleration, stopping and strafe impulse.

element.name: Advanced Handling
element.description: Additional improvements to turning and lateral movement.

element.name: Advanced Void Surfaces
element.description: Allows construction of larger void surface components, for faster deep space travel.

element.name: Plasma I
element.description: Allows construction of Plasma Mk I turrets

element.name: Positron Coating
element.description: Increase the damage per unit of energy of our plasma bolts by 15%.

element.name: Plasma II
element.description: Allows construction of Mk II Plasma Turrets.

element.name: Hyperionization
element.description: Increase the damage per unit of energy of our plasma bolts by an additional 20%.

element.name: Plasma Mk III
element.description: Allows construction of Mk III Plasma Turrets.

element.name: Plasma Coherence
element.description: Increases the range of our plasma weapons.

element.name: Plasma Phase Alignment
element.description: Further increase the range of our plasma projectiles.

element.name: Pure Phase Coherence
element.description: Even greater plasma range.

element.name: Maximal Cohesion
element.description: Maximized range of our plasma weapons.

element.name: Bolt Accelerator
element.description: Increase the speed of our plasma projectiles.

element.name: Turret Repeater
element.description: Increases the base fire rate of our plasma turrets by 10%.

element.name: Plasmoid Impulse
element.description: Additional boost to plasma bolt speed.

element.name: Rapid Recoil Recovery
element.description: Increase the fire rate of our plasma turrets by an additional 10%.

element.name: Transionic Impulse
element.description: Even faster plasma bolts combined with an additional 10% fire rate.

element.name: Frictionless Bearings
element.description: Increase the turn rate of turrets, allowing for faster re-targeting.

element.name: Levitating Gimbals
element.description: Even faster turret rotation, for quicker re-targeting.

element.name: Plasma Focusing
element.description: Increase the accuracy of our plasma weapons.

element.name: Advanced Focusing
element.description: Further increase the accuracy of our plasma weapons.

element.name: Reactors I
element.description: Allows construction of Mini Reactors and Antimatter Batteries storage.

element.name: Chiralite Recapture
element.description: Increases energy production rate by 7%

element.name: Reactors II
element.description: Allow construction of Mk II reactors.

element.name: Anti-proton Chains
element.description: Additional 10% boost to energy production.

element.name: Reactors III
element.description: Allow construction of Mk III reactors.

element.name: Penning Cage
element.description: Increases our max energy reserves by 7%.

element.name: Batteries II
element.description: Allows construction of Mk II batteries with greater reserves.

element.name: Anti-matter Traps
element.description: Additional 10% increase to max energy reserves.

element.name: Batteries III
element.description: Larger, more powerful energy store.

element.name: Officer Training
element.description: Our command crew oversees ship operations and carries out anomaly surveys.

element.name: Battlestation Training
element.description: Allows our crew brief surges in ship repair. Particularly useful for keeping systems operational during combat.

element.name: Assisted Recovery
element.description:
Every crew member with at least 1 Biomed increases Battlestation recovery speed by 10%.

Additional skill levels on the same officer provide diminishing returns.

element.name: Plasma Fire Support
element.description:
Every crew member with at least 1 Tactics increases Plasma Turret Accuracy by 10% and Plasma Fire Rate by 5%.

Additional skill levels on the same officer provide diminishing returns.

element.name: Spatial Partitioning
element.description:
Every crew member with at least 1 Observation increases detection range by 5%.

Additional skill levels on the same officer provide diminishing returns.

element.name: Shared Perspective
element.description:
Each command crew member with at least 1 observation increases the maximum viewport range by 5%.

Additional skill levels on the same officer provide diminishing returns.

element.name: Coordinated Response
element.description:
Every crew member with at least 1 Engineering increases repair rate by 10%. 

Additional skill levels on the same officer provide diminishing returns.

element.name: Miracle Worker
element.description: Crew with at least 5 Engineering has a chance of saving ship from catastrophic damage at great personal peril.

element.name: Resource Spotters
element.description:
Every crew with at least 1 Astro increases the expected value of resource drops by 15%.

Additional skill levels on the same officer provide diminishing returns.

element.name: Artifact Spotters
element.description:
Every crew with at least 2 Astro moderately increases the probability of finding artifact drops.

(Skill beyond 2 provides no additional benefit.)

element.name: Emergency Self-Stabilize
element.description: Any crew with at least 1 Biomed will quickly stabilize themselves up to 20% health when back aboard the ship.

element.name: First Response
element.description:
Every crew member with at least 1 Biomed has a 10% chance of preventing support crew from being critically injured.

Additional skill levels on the same officer provide diminishing returns.

element.name: Tractor Beam Splitter
element.description: Allows our tractor beam system to collect two items at once and increases their attract speed.

element.name: Strange Attractors
element.description: Increases the speed and range of our tractor beams.

element.name: Extra Strong Force
element.description: Additional boost to the attract speed of our tractor beams.

element.name: Super Collectors
element.description: Ultra-fast long-range tractor beams.

element.name: Force Field Projection
element.description: Substantially increases the range of our tractor beams.

element.name: Wave Defractor
element.description: An additional tractor beam

element.name: Gravity Generator
element.description: Allows construction of a gravity generator module that fires force projectiles which push low-mass targets.

element.name: Gravitational Lens
element.description: Increase the max charge of our gravity generator gun.

element.name: Universal Translators
element.description: Allows us to understand the language of other races and civilizations

element.name: Trade Analysis
element.description: Shows the relative pricing of resources in trade relative to their base value.

element.name: Sensor Calibration
element.description: Increases our detection range by 10%. Minor boost to max viewport range.

element.name: Scanner Mk I
element.description: Allows construction of a scanner module which will increase our detection range.

element.name: Survey Efficiency
element.description: Increase the speed of planetary scans and survey landings.

element.name: Subscatter Detection
element.description: Increases the range at which we can detect other vessels by 30%.

element.name: Sensor Histories
element.description: Connects sensor archive data with navcomputer, showing exploration "fog" overlay in map view.

element.name: Byrol Resolver
element.description: Further extends the maximum range of our viewport zoom.

element.name: Fixed Guns
element.description: Allows the construction of Fixed Guns. Fixed Guns can only fire in the direction they're mounted in, but have longer range and more power than plasma turrets.

element.name: Coil Projection
element.description: Extends the range and projectile speed of our fixed guns.

element.name: Fixed Guns Mk II
element.description: Allows construction of more powerful Fixed Guns that are able to draw more energy per shot for greater damage.

element.name: Lunar Waneshafts
element.description: Further increases the range and speed of our fixed guns.

element.name: Bolt Dephasement
element.description: Increases the damage per unit energy of our fixed guns.

element.name: Hyperthermal Bolts
element.description: Further increases the damage per unit energy of our fixed guns.

element.name: Target Assist
element.description: Redirects our fixed gun projectiles by several degrees towards the nearest target, improving fire accuracy.

element.name: Magnetic Alignment
element.description: Additional fire accuracy assist.

element.name: Vorpal Bolts
element.description: If our fixed gun shots hit a module or target below a certain health percent, they will continue through to whatever is behind.

element.name: Enhanced Penetrators
element.description: Allow our fixed gun projectiles to punch-through targets with higher health.

element.name: Cannon Projectiles
element.description: Allows an alternate fire mode of our fixed guns, with higher energy cost, slower rate of fire, but much greater damage that falls off over distance.

element.name: Havok I
element.description: Havok modules create a temporary perimeter of explosive bursts around our vessel. Particularly effective against missiles, drones and other unarmored targets.

element.name: Perimeter Enhancement
element.description: Accelerates the fire rate and projectile speed of our Havok modules.

element.name: Burst Synchronization
element.description: Additional increase in the fire rate and projectile speed of our Havok modules.

element.name: Burst Intensification
element.description: Increases the damage of our Havok Bursts

element.name: Sustained Fire Control
element.description: Increase the duration of a Havok volley by 2.5 seconds and reduces cool down time by 10%.

element.name: Control Extension
element.description: Increase the duration of a Havok volley by an additional 3 seconds.

element.name: Havok Coolant
element.description: Reduces the cooldown time of our Havok modules by 20%.

element.name: Burst BEC Cooling
element.description: Additional 20% cooldown rate for our Havok modules.

element.name: Havok Shroud
element.description: Allows an alternate weaponized version of the Havok, launching a mass of independently targeted projectiles.

element.name: Shroud Enhancement
element.description: Havok Shroud fires two additional projectiles.

element.name: Missiles I
element.description: Allows the construction of missile modules, which fire long-range targeted projectiles.

element.name: Deuterium Propellant
element.description: Increase the range and speed of our missiles by 10%.

element.name: Burn Efficiency
element.description: Additional 15% missile range.

element.name: Standoff Missiles
element.description: Additional 20% missile range.

element.name: Gimbaled Thrust
element.description: Improves our missile's turn rate, allowing for better target tracking.

element.name: Nano-Vernier Stabilizers
element.description: Faster missiles turning.

element.name: Reactive Ion Thrust
element.description: Faster missiles turning.

element.name: Improved Yields
element.description: Increase the damage of our missiles by 10%.

element.name: Enhanced Warheads
element.description: Additional 20% damage to missile yields.

element.name: Ablative Casing
element.description: Gives our missiles an ablative shell that has a chance of stopping incoming damage.

element.name: Dephased Missiles
element.description: Our missiles will dephase briefly, making them difficult to shoot down.

element.name: Advanced Dephasing
element.description: Increases our missiles' dephase duration.

element.name: Swarm Missiles
element.description: Our missiles separate after launch into two smaller warheads with evasive approach patterns, making them harder to shoot down.

element.name: Trinity Warheads
element.description: Our swarm missiles will separate into three warheads instead of two for 50% more damage.

element.name: Fission Missiles
element.description: Allows switching to more powerful fission warheads. Fission warheads consume uranium, have a slower production time and fewer per launcher, but are significantly more powerful.

element.name: Fighter Drones
element.description:
Allows the construction of a fighter drone hangar.

Fighters cost 1 unit of Aluminum for a squadron of 5.

element.name: Fast Attack Fighters
element.description: Increases our fighters attack speed, reaching their target faster and making them harder to hit.

element.name: Evasive Fighters
element.description: Our fighters become harder for projectile weapons to hit, lasting longer in the fight.

element.name: Advanced Maneuvers
element.description: Additional increase to our fighters ability to evade enemy projectiles.

element.name: Carrier Machine Shop
element.description: Increases the rate of fighter drone production by 30%.

element.name: Carrier Efficiency
element.description: Further increase fighter production rate.

element.name: Deck Elevators
element.description: Increases our maximum squadrons by 1.

element.name: Large Squadrons
element.description: Increase the size of our fighter squadrons by 2.

element.name: Reinforced Fighters
element.description: Increases the amount of damage fighters can take before being destroyed.

element.name: Heavy Fighters
element.description: Increase our fighters' attack and armor, at the cost of lower top speed.

element.name: Lasers I
element.description: Allows construction of laser modules, which fire a highly concentrated beam at the target.

element.name: Super Luminescence
element.description: Increases the damage our lasers deliver per unit of energy.

element.name: Beam Power Scaling
element.description: Further increases the damage delivered per unit of energy.

element.name: Advanced Optics
element.description: Increases the maximum range and target acquisition speed of our lasers.

element.name: Virtual Lensing
element.description: Decreases the time our lasers need to acquire and begin firing on a target.

element.name: Neural Assist Optics
element.description: Even faster laser acquisition speed.

element.name: Femto Acquisition
element.description: Super-fast laser acquisition speed.

element.name: Precision Penetration
element.description: Allows beams to shoot through partially damaged modules to reach a targeted component.

element.name: Trielectric Permitivity
element.description: Increases the maximum effective range of our lasers.

element.name: Optical Vortices
element.description: Additional increase in laser range.

element.name: Beam Supercohesion
element.description: Maximum laser range

element.name: Shield Harmonics
element.description: Increase the max charge of our shields by 10%.

element.name: Field Capacitance
element.description: Increase our max shield charge by an additional 20%.

element.name: Quantum Flux
element.description: Increases the recharge rate of our shields by 15%.

element.name: Rapid Energizers
element.description: Increase our shield recharge rate by an additional 15%.

element.name: Field Inductance
element.description: Reduce the energy cost of shield charging by 20%.

element.name: Force Field Enthalpy
element.description: Slow the amount by which our shields naturally discharge when energized.

element.name: Integral Field Theory
element.description: Further decrease our shields natural discharge rate.

element.name: Tensor Stability
element.description: Slow our shields natural decay even further.

element.name: Plasma Reflection
element.description: Most of the energy of plasma projectiles is reflected away.

element.name: Fallen Empire
element.description: Technologies of the Fallen Empire

element.name: Nanite Recovery
element.description: Increases the chance of recovering nanite superfluids from enemy ships.

element.name: Nanite Efficiency
element.description: Improves the amount of repair from nanite superfluid drops by 50%.

element.name: Imperial Blight
element.description: Research how to genetically modify the "imperial blight".

element.name: EMP Resistance
element.description: Reduce the duration and intensity of EMP burst effects by 20%.

element.name: Radiation Resistance
element.description: Decrease the risk to our crew from the Devout's radiation attacks.

element.name: Wormhole Gateways
element.description: Understanding of how to activate the Remnant Gateway artifacts.

element.name: Starlance Equation
element.description: Solve the equation that Capt. Dolson's team uncovered.

element.name: Spacetime Censor
element.description: Should hopefully allow safe passage through an immodest singularity.

element.name: Experimental Modules
element.description: Experiment with using cosmetic modules that currently have not been added to the tech tree. Many of these do not have implemented functionality.

element.name: EMP Missiles
element.description: Allows NPCs to use EMP missiles

element.name: Radiation Missiles
element.description: Allows NPCs to fire radiation missiles.
